'''4th UFCA Awards'''
----
Best Picture:
''''' The Dark Knight '''''
The '''4th [[Utah Film Critics Association]] Awards''' honored the best filmmaking of [[2008 in film|2008]].http://www.altfg.com/blog/awards/utah-film-critics-awards-2008/ ==Winners== *'''Best Actor:''' **[[Mickey Rourke]] - ''[[The Wrestler (2008 film)|The Wrestler]]'' ''Runner-up'' (tie): [[Sean Penn]] - ''[[Milk (film)|Milk]]'' and [[Richard Jenkins]] - ''[[The Visitor (2008 film)|The Visitor]]'' *'''Best Actress:''' **[[Melissa Leo]] - ''[[Frozen River]]'' ''Runner-up'': [[Anne Hathaway (actress)|Anne Hathaway]] - ''[[Rachel Getting Married]]'' *'''Best Animated Feature:''' **''[[WALL E]]'' ''Runner-up'': ''[[Kung Fu Panda]]'' *'''Best Director:''' **[[Andrew Stanton]] - ''[[WALL E]]'' ''Runner-up'': [[Christopher Nolan]] - ''[[The Dark Knight (film)|The Dark Knight]]'' *'''Best Documentary Feature:''' **''[[Man on Wire]]'' ''Runner-up'' (tie): ''[[Waltz with Bashir]]'' and ''[[Encounters at the End of the World]]'' *'''Best Picture:''' **''[[The Dark Knight (film)|The Dark Knight]]'' ''Runner-up'': ''[[Rachel Getting Married]]'' *'''Best Non-English Language Feature:''' **''[[Let the Right One In (film)|Let the Right One In]]'', [[Sweden]] ''Runner-up'': ''[[Waltz with Bashir]]'' *'''Best Supporting Actor:''' (Unanimously) **[[Heath Ledger]] - ''[[The Dark Knight (film)|The Dark Knight]]'' *'''Best Supporting Actress:''' **[[Rosemarie DeWitt]] - ''[[Rachel Getting Married]]'' ''Runner-up'' (tie): [[Frances McDormand]] - ''[[Burn After Reading]]'', [[Misty Upham]] - ''[[Frozen River]]'' and [[Evan Rachel Wood]] - ''[[The Wrestler (2008 film)|The Wrestler]]'' *'''Best Screenplay:''' **''[[Rachel Getting Married]]'' - [[Jenny Lumet]] ''Runner-up'': ''[[The Wrestler (2008 film)|The Wrestler]]'' - [[Robert Siegel]] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:2008 film awards]]
